website_summaries.verdict: The most affordable ECOVACS vacuum that has a bonus mopping feature as well.
pros: Can be controlled via an app or with Alexa
Includes a detachable deep-clean brush roll and a max-power suction function
Slightly longer battery life than other models
cons: This model can't always find its charger and can get stuck under furniture and on cords

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Its great at getting all the corners and areas that your regular vacuum will not fit in. The suction power is Amazing. Picks up EVERYTHING, even cords. Becareful with cords on the floor. I learn the hardway. Found my lap top on the floor and the charger was ripped in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not cleaning as it should, missing parts, will not connect to wifi 5ghz and advanced wear and tear.
customer_reviews.text: The product has advanced scratch marks. It is also leaving a lot of dirt on the tiled floor. The mop is missing and I haven't checked to see what else is missing. It was not as advertised. Before I bought the product, I looked at all the glowing remarks about the product now I wonder about the authenticity of those remarks.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wachira

customer_reviews.title: Love these robots.
customer_reviews.text: Being a refurbished unit it had cosmetic blemishes but functioned well... For a little while. It developed issues like a stripped gear or something similar and became non-functional. It took very few messages to get the item returned and the seller was very easy to communicate with and unfortunately they didn't have a replacement so I had to go with a refund. I would definitely purchase another one of the robots from the same company, ecovacs, and wouldn't hesitate to purchase from the same seller. These robotic vacuums and mops are a God send for me being a disabled vet, it saves me time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Larson

customer_reviews.title: Skip this
customer_reviews.text: I've had unit for almost a year. I wish I never bought this. It gets stuck on the dumbest of things. I have hardwood flooring, door mat and thin carpet in my living room. This got gets stuck on the door mat and carpet without fail. It even gets stuck trying to force itself under my sofa. I have to wall off the carpet and remove any mats I have laying around. Cleaning wise, when paired with floor cleaning solution - don't do it. If you're looking for deep cleaning solution stick to manual labor or get a steam mop. Device will not connect to 5 GHz network. Alexa support only, no Google Home option. Waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to connect the vacuum WiFi to my ATT home wifi, but that’s fine I can live with that. BUT I cannot live with the vacuum automatically turning on at 10pm, 3am, 1pm and so on, plus the damage wires. I contacted the manufacturer 5x to fix and following all their troubleshooting instructions and NOTHING changed. The manufacturer is not taking responsibility because the warranty expired 2 months ago. I would advise you to pay a little bit more for a more trustful brand!

product_meta.title: ECOVACS DEEBOT M80 Pro Robot Vacuum Cleaner with Mop and Water Tank Attachment, Brush Roll Attachment, for Pet Hair, Fur, Dirt, Stains, Thin Carpet, Hardwood and Tile Floor, Works with Alexa (Renewed)
product_meta.description: Tired of the mundane task of floor-cleaning? Now there's a solution: DM80: an advanced floor-cleaning robot from ECOVACS. Equipped with a large capacity dustbin and intensive cleaning functions, this product can clean more thoroughly and for longer time between having to empty the dustbin so you can keep your feet up for longer. The two in one mopping and drying stages are optional - the mopping attachment can be added and removed as required for complete customization over how your DM80 cleans. 1. 5-stage cleaning system DEEBOT M80 sweeps, lifts, vacuums, mops and dries in one pass with the effective 5-stage cleaning process. Of course, the mopping and drying stages are optional - the mopping attachment can be added and removed as required for complete customization over how your DM80 cleans. While mopping, the DEEBOT controls the amount of water used, which is minimal, keeping the wet mop damp, with the dry mop wiping it away after; protecting your hard floor from being drenched. 2. Multiple cleaning modes DEEBOT M80 has 4 cleaning modes to choose from to effectively clean up almost any mess. Intensive cleaning mode – increases the rotating speed and suction power for a deeper clean Edge cleaning mode - for cleaning edges and corners Spot cleaning mode - for a small area of highly concentrated dirt or dust Auto cleaning mode - for everyday cleaning 3. Can clean carpets for added versatility 4. Stair Safety Technology & Obstacle Detection Technology 5. Remote Control & Auto Daily Cleaning
feature_bullets: Control with included remote, through your smartphone, or through Amazon Alexa

Up to 110 minutes of use per charge, obstacle detection and stair safety , Alexa Voice & Smart Phone App Controls: Start & stop cleans using Alexa. Use the ECOVACS app to select cleaning modes, schedule cleaning sessions, monitor accessory status & receive alerts
5-Stage Cleaning System: Detachable deep-clean brush-roll & mop, plus max power suction function that increases suction power by 36%

Smart Motion Cleaning, plus Anti-Collision/Drop Sensors: Advanced auto-clean navigation system, plus 3 specialized cleaning modes and comprehensive anti-collision/drop sensor protection; 500 ml Capacity Anti-Spill Dustbin: A unique dustbin design supports longer cleaning sessions, a high-efficiency air filtration system & prevents debris spillage when cleaning the dustbin
